topic.title: Starting a pedophile support group on ZeroNet
topic.body:
I'm toying with the idea of starting a pedophile support group on ZeroNet. NOTHING ILLEGAL, but genuine support for pedophiles who don't touch kids, friends, those that want to understand and those that have been hurt by offenders. For context, this support group would be a continuation of one that was banned from reddit unjustly.

I'm wondering how hostile the community would be towards it. Would anyone be willing to seed? Would I need to do my own identity and mail services if people didn't want us to use theirs?

1_1GuYKebkQAqGJ4tNpNp4TD1UuoHHudCJLA.body:
@nextbit There is actually a different word for it - 'minor attracted person'. It would probably be better to use this term.

Free will is a complex topic in itself which we should probably educate people on more. It's not like anyone can ever choose something without being influenced by their situation (knowledge, skills, life experience.)
Disgusting! I don't want to rape, torture or murder kids. What's wrong with you, telling people how to get to places to do that? Do you even care about kids?

1_141BoRKHLRi8JjCtbJjqRjSvM61YE6jUhs.body: @sealove and @daredevill: Hey there! Welcome to ZeroNet.
